name: GLR10X10
description:
Do you know the game called LoadRunner?
Inspired by this game, I removed the annoying things and sublimated it into a pure puzzle game.
This is a brand new pure puzzle in the style of LoadRunner.
However, the rules are quite different, so please think of it as a different game.
There are no more enemies, the direction of gravity changes when you touch an arrow, the concept of time disappears, and you can think as much as you want.
If you collect GOLD and enter the exit, the stage will be cleared.
The map has 100 squares of 10X10, and the top, bottom, left, and right are connected, making it a rather difficult puzzle.
This time, we prepared 101 stages.
I think the difficulty level is a little difficult, but if you get the hang of it, I think you can clear it.
You can play 20 stages at the beginning.
If you clear 15 out of 20 stages, you will be able to play up to the next 40 stages.
Please meet the conditions and be able to play all stages.
There is also a stage editor.
A bonus game is also provided.
This is a simple game where you can freely change the direction of gravity and destroy as many blocks as you want.
Please play lightly when you are tired.
